concept.title: Setting up a Community
concept.shortdesc: You can configure and subsequently change the Sametime community connection information, typically you use the connection information that was specified by your administrator.â€¯The first time that you start the app and there are no communities configured, you are prompted to setup a community.

conbody.p: After you have a community configured, on subsequent starts of the app, the Login screen is presented. To manage existing communities or add a new community, tap the Community field on the login screen. A list of your currently configured communities displays. From there you can tap the edit communities button to make changes to the communities.
